name: The Story of Simon Simopath
description:
WARNING

This game contains bright flashing imagery. If you have epilepsy, do NOT play this game!

_____________________________________________________________

Spread love to the hum-drum robots of the world with Simon, a boy who dreams of flying. Try to time your actions and the scene changes to the music. Rescue all the robots to clear each song.
